thread.title: Mike Flynn Reportedly Tells FBI: I’ll Testify In Exchange For Immunity
thread.title_full: Mike Flynn Reportedly Tells FBI: I’ll Testify In Exchange For Immunity

author: Christian Datoc
title: Mike Flynn Reportedly Tells FBI: I’ll Testify In Exchange For Immunity
text:
TOP 5565004 
Donald Trump’s former National Security Advisor Mike Flynn reportedly told federal investigators that he is willing to testify on President Trump’s potential connections to Russia in exchange for full immunity. Retired U.S. Army Lieutenant General Michael Flynn boards an elevator as he arrives at Trump Tower where U.S. President-elect Donald Trump lives in New York (REUTERS) 
Flynn resigned after it was revealed that he met with Russian ambassador to the United States Sergey Kislyak during the 2016 election and subsequently lied about it. 
Officials close to the situation told The Wall Street Journal that Flynn made offers to both the FBI and Senate Intelligence Committee staffers, yet neither party has accepted. Retired U.S. Army Lieutenant General Michael Flynn boards an elevator as he arrives at Trump Tower where U.S. President-elect Donald Trump lives in New York (REUTERS) 
The Senate Intelligence Committee held a hearing Thursday on Russian interference in the 2016 election and the Trump campaign’s possible connections to the Kremlin.
